title: Manage VIP Suite Access List
description: A corporate suite holder needs to provide a list of guests who will be attending the game and need access to the suite.

tasks.description: Receive the guest list from the suite holder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the list of names for the suite.

tasks.description: Upload the guest list to the venue's access control system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the guests to the system.

tasks.description: Provide the suite holder with instructions on how their guests can check in on game day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends clear instructions to the suite holder.
